description:
Hosted by Volusion’s team of experts, the goal of this course is to help entrepreneurs and business owners create an ecommerce store to sell products online.

You’ll learn how to establish an online brand presence and how to create an ecommerce website using Volusion's ecommerce software. The course also covers the basics of domain registration, inventory management, payment gateways, tax and shipping for your online store.

The 9 video lessons in this course are:

  • Getting to know your Volusion account
  • Establishing your brand
  • Designing your online store
  • Setting up inventory
  • Preparing to accept payments
  • Setting up tax and shipping
  • Putting the finishing touches to your store
  • Going live with your online store

After each lesson, we’ve also included additional reading material that allows you to dive deeper into the topic.
title: Build an Online Store with Volusion
